title: Number of connected wearable devices worldwide by region 2015 to 2022
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 6 lines representing Asia Pacific, Central and Eastern Europe, Latin America, Middle East and Africa, North America, and Western Europe. The y axis denotes Wearable devices in millions and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall North America is rapidly increasing, Asia Pacific, Central and Eastern Europe, Latin America, Middle East and Africa, and Western Europe are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
North America has increased by 1035.8344113842174 percent.
Overall across the Year, North America mostly maintained the highest Wearable devices in millions when compared to others with a mean value of 230.25, and it peaked at 2022.
Followed by Asia Pacific which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 174.7 Wearable devices in millions,reaching its highest point  at 2022 with a value of 311.0.
The botommost line, Latin America,  has a mean of 24.42, and peaked at 2022.

max_summary: This is a multi-line chart with 6 lines representing Asia Pacific, Central and Eastern Europe, Latin America, Middle East and Africa, North America, and Western Europe. The y axis denotes Wearable devices in millions and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall North America is rapidly increasing, Asia Pacific, Central and Eastern Europe, Latin America, Middle East and Africa, and Western Europe are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
North America has increased by 1035.8344113842174 percent.
Throughout the period, North America generally had the highest Wearable devices in millions relative to others with an average of 230.25, and it reached its maximum at 2022 with a value of 439.0.
After North America, Asia Pacific overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 174.7, peaking at 2022.
Latin America mostly had the least Wearable devices in millions with a mean value of 24.42, which peaked at 2022 with a value of 49.0.
The minimum Wearable devices in millions about 1.83, occured at 2015 by Latin America.
